cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.current_location: about 205 miles ESE of Wilmington, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving northwest toward the southern North Carolina coast, then expected to slow and drift west-southwest across eastern South Carolina

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: South Santee River SC to Duck NC; Tropical-Storm Warning north of Duck NC to Cape Charles Light VA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: primarily North Carolina and northern South Carolina coasts
weather_observation.wind: Outer bands could bring occasional tropical-storm-force gusts (25-35 kt) late Friday through Saturday; overall probability of sustained 34 kt winds is low (≤26 %).
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the Georgia coast; surge warnings begin north of the GA/SC border.
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain possible in intermittent squalls; widespread flooding not expected at the port.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents will affect the Georgia beaches through the weekend.
